main.title: A fresh breath in corporate life
main.titleCatalog: buy a cup with a logo
main.bannerText: We have improved the process of ordering products so that you and your company can focus on the main tasks and achieve the set goals.
main.bannerCatalogText: Cups with a logo are a classic. Any conference or business meeting will not do without this prop. It is also a great gift for your employees, business partners, friends or regular customers. Owners of catering establishments can order large batches of cups for their restaurant or cafe. You can also distribute these products during advertising events, presentations, exhibitions or conferences.

popular.title: Most popular
popular.subText: Products most often ordered by our customers

creative.subTitle: Do you want to surprise your colleagues/partners with unusual gifts?
creative.subText: Choose ready-made gift sets or specify the criteria by which we will assemble a unique box for you.
creative.contentTitle: In addition to high-quality finished products, we can produce clothes, accessories, goodies and other items for you to order.
creative.contentSubTitle: Thanks to personal production, we produce large quantities in a short time, and you always have the opportunity to customize products.

idea.title: Do you have your own UNIQUE idea for developing merch?
idea.subTitle: We will make merch according to your design. We will tell you life hacks and introduce you to production technology, and provide samples of materials.
idea.formTitle: Enter your contact information and our manager will contact you within 1 hour

formSubTitle.1: Have a question that hasn't been answered?
formSubTitle.2: Leave your contact and our manager will contact you

cart.contactsText: Enter your contact information and our manager will contact you within 1 hour
cart.contactsSubText: Pressing 'Confirm your agreement', you give time to process your personal data
